transcript:
how do you actually create these
affirmations well the first thing I'm
going to give you four different best
practices I guess you could say for
creating affirmations and using them the
first one is to be very specific what it
is that you want if you just say that
you want something and you're very
generic you might get what you want the
second thing is to bring in an emotional
charge try to bring in as much emotion
as you possibly can the next one which
is number three is consistent repetition
once again if you say something over and
over and over and over and over again a
100,000 times with the next year you're
you're going to start to believe it and
the last piece is as I said if you want
to put gas in the fire combine it with
visualization so your brain can actually
start to visualize what it would look
like
